pageContext.claim: “They're taking them out to the maximum 30 hours. That's a lot of time -- 30 hours -- to interview people that are going to be approved. I mean, they go 30 hours and then people will vote, and it's a disgrace.”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats frequently force Republicans to ask for a cloture vote, which triggers a 30-hour period of debate. But Democrats do not always used up all 30 hours; they also do not force a cloture vote on every nominee.
